name: strict-migration
description: Strict refactoring and migration plugin with MVP/Full enforcement, real user simulation testing, and implementation auditing

skills.solid-design-rules: SOLID principles and TDD enforcement rules
skills.strict-implementation-rules: MVP/Full scope enforcement and anti-dummy rules

agents.implementation-auditor: Detects dummy code, hardcoding, and incomplete implementations
agents.test-executor: Executes static tests and real user simulation tests

commands.migrate: Step-by-step strict migration workflow with MVP/Full enforcement
commands.analyze: Quick SOLID and implementation quality analysis
commands.audit: Run implementation audit to detect violations
